pages.text: $(li)The Tiger is a big feline that can be found in the Bamboo Jungles. It naturally wary of outsiders and will attack if approached.$(br)$(li)By feeding them meat, you can obtain the Tiger's Blessing.$(br)$(li)This effect allows to you approach a Tiger without being mauled for a few minutes.
It can be bred with Acacia Blossoms.
